item.title: Good writing is natural writing
item.description: A good piece of writing is one that sounds natural. Read this sentence: I do believe that spending a large part of leisure time on utilizing cellphones is a negative trend.

item.title: Simple but correct
item.description: üí° Simpler but correct language will earn a better score for vocabulary than inaccurate usage of “advanced” words and phrases.
